doc.name: JAITranspose
doc.description: Transpose a RenderedOp. The user can choose among six different transpositions. flip antidiagonal flips an image along the antidiagonal. flip diagonal flips an image along the diagonal. flip horizontal flips an image along the horizontal. flip vertical flips an image along the vertical. rotate 90, rotate 180, rotate 270, rotate an image 90, 180, and 270 degrees respectively.
doc.author: James Yeh
doc.property: The type of transposing to do. This is a string valued attribute that defaults to type "flip horizontal",
